programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Time Traveller, American Stonehenge, Plant Perception: Check out mind-reading plants, pagan human sacrifice and Californian time travellers. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Drop the Bomb: American Jewellery is celebrating its 30th anniversary and Les wants to put on a big party to enjoy this milestone. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Aliens And Insects: Could insects have descended from extraterrestrials? Experts investigate whether Earth's 10 quintillion critters could have dangerous links to aliens. (S6, ep 10)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Reptillians: Experts question whether ancient myths provide evidence that reptillian aliens are more than just pop-culture creations and staples of science-fiction. (S6, ep 12)

programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S9, ep 1)

programme.title: Junk & Disorderly
programme.desc: Henry, Allen and Guy dig through Matt XX's cast-offs, finding a vintage Chopper and a 1950s motorised bicycle. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Take That Beethoven: Ricky and Bubba seek revenge against "Cowboy" Matt Blevins at auctions in Dallas. Plus, the fate of a musical instrument causes a huge row. (S5, ep 9)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick's Big Shot: A seller comes in with an overcoat once owned by Lee Harvey Oswald, Corey checks out a 30-year-old Gibson guitar and Rick and Corey check out a WWII half-track.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Stolen Gold: At the new shop, the Golds are chuffed to find a bag of gems inside an old employee's desk. But what will they do if the owner returns to claim his treasure? (S5, ep 3)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Banned For Life: A man wants to buy some super-expensive earrings on the condition that the store also does his piercing. Will the Golds strike a deal? (S5, ep 4)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Rematch: Ashley's nemesis Tressa returns to sell the Rolex that got her fired. Insults start to fly and not even Les can stop Ashley leaping over the counter. (S5, ep 5)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Ancient Structures: Certain structures on our planet have stood the test of time and continue to astonish mankind - so much so, that alien intervention has not been ruled out. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Alien Disclosure Files
programme.desc: Hotspots: Some places are known for so many reports of UAP sightings that people flock from all around the world, just to catch a glimpse of a flying saucer. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Naughty Hands & Crazy Pants: Brandon and Lori uncover a vintage machine filled with risque photos, before our buyers lock horns over what could be priceless artwork. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Storage Hunters

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon yr Estrys a'r Mochyn fferm fydd yn cael y sylw. In this programme, it's the Ostrich and Pig that feature.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Nid yw Pablo'n gallu dweud wrth nain beth mae o eisie i frecwast. Mae'n rhaid i'r anifeiliaid ei helpu ffeindio'r geiriau i esbonio beth mae ei angen. The animals help Pablo with brekkie!

programme.title: New: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Mrs Moss wedi cyrraedd rownd derfynol gwobr Pennaeth Gorau Cymru. Mae Miss Enfys wedi rhoi Anni yng ngofal trefnu'r parti! Mrs Moss has reached the finals of the Best Welsh Head prize!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn a Help Llaw yn adeiladu parc themau anhygoel! On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn and Help Llaw have built an amazing theme park!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Morgan y neidr filtroed a Lola a'i ieir. Today we meet Morgan the millipede and Lola and her hens.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Heddiw yn Shwshaswyn, mae Capten yn creu toes, Fflwff yn edrych ar flawd a Seren yn pobi torth. Today, the Captain is making dough, Fflwff is playing with flour and Seren is baking bread.

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Er iddo drefnu cael ras geir efo Elsi, mae Stiw'n penderfynu aros yn y ty i gadw cwmni i Dad, sydd wedi brifo ei droed. Stiw's dad twists his ankle and Stiw decides to help look after him.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Mari yn cael parti'r jwngl gyda Heulwen, Dwylo'r Enfys. Today, Mari will be having a jungle party with Heulwen from Dwylo'r Enfys.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Mr Parri yn penderfynu bod cludo bwyd yn y fan i bobl yn llawer rhy araf, felly mae ganddo drôns i wneud y gwaith. Mr Parri has decided to use drones to deliver food to his customers!

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Mae Rhys yn chwarae i dim hoci ia enwog Diawled Caerdydd - a fydd e'n ennill ei dlws unigol cyntaf? Rhys plays ice hockey for Cardiff Junior Devils. But will he win his first solo trophy?

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Pan mai Mrs Wishi Washi'n ymddangos mae'n amser i anifeiliaid mwdlyd y fferm gael bath. Druan ohonyn nhw! When Mrs Wishi Washi appears it's bathtime for the muddy farm animals - poor them!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Hoff fwyd Twm Twrch yw mwydod, ond heddiw mae Dorti yn ei herio i fod fel hi a pheidio â bwyta mwydod. Today, Dorti challenges Twm Twrch to be like her and to not eat worms at all.

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae'r gwencwn yn dwyn cwch Gwich ond cyn bo hir ma' nhw mewn trafferth ar afon wyllt. The weasels steal Gwich's rowing boat but soon find themselves in trouble on a fast flowing river.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae'r teulu wedi mynd i wersylla, ac mae Deian a Loli'n edrych ymlaen at fwyta malws melys, ond tydi Loli ddim yn rhannu'n deg! Deian and Loli are camping and excited to eat marshmallows!

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Dyw Pablo ddim yn hoffi syrpreisus. Felly pan mae anrheg penblwydd yn cyrraedd yn hwyr, nid yw eisiau ei agor. When Pablo gets a birthday present after his birthday, it is very confusing!

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: O na! Mae Dad wedi anghofio ei bod yn ben-blwydd ar Mam-gu! Gall cacen munud ola' gan Dad a rap gan Anni a Cai ei phlesio? Oh no! Dad has forgotten that it's Mam-gu's birthday!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn trefnu parti sypreis i Mabli! All Huwcyn orffen y paratoi mewn amser? On today's adventure, Huwcyn is planning a special surprise party for Mabli!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Pa anifail wnawn ni gwrdd â heddiw tybed? Which animal will we meet today at Gwesty Sigldigwt?

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae gan y Capten botel ddiddorol, mae Seren yn chwarae â photiau halen a phupur, ac mae Fflwff yn mwynhau powlenaid o gawl. Today, the Captain has an interesting bottle...

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Awn i oerfel gogledd Rwsia i gwrdd â'r Walrws ac i wres anialwch yr Aifft i gwrdd â'r Sgorpion. We visit icy north Russia to meet a Walrus and to the desert of Egypt to meet the Scorpion.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae Seth y ci fferm yn cyfarth byth a hefyd a does neb yn gwybod pam! Seth the dog is barking a lot and nobody knows why! I wonder if Jen and Jim can work out why Seth is barking?

programme.title: Teulu Ni
programme.desc: Mae Halima a'i theulu yn dathlu eu diwylliant Islamaidd a Chymraeg. Ar ôl cael gwers Arabeg maen nhw'n mynd am dro i Gastell Talacharn. Halima & family celebrate their Muslim/Welsh culture.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith Yn Ol
programme.desc: Mae rhywbeth mawr yn digwydd yn Llys Llywelyn heddiw - rhywbeth o'r enw Eisteddfod! There is something very exciting happening in Llys Llywelyn today - something called an Eisteddfod!

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Norbet wedi dechrau chwarae Golff Gwirion ac mae'n awyddus i ddangos ei sgiliau newydd i'r Olobobs. Norbet has taken up Crazy Golf and tries to show the Olobobs how good he's become.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Glenys yn dod o hyd i fap sy'n dangos lle mae'r cnau yn yr helfa gnau yn cael eu cuddio ac mae'n ymuno yn y gêm. Glenys finds a map showing where the nuts for the Nut Hunt are hidden!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Hari'n holi, 'Pam bod pobl yn cael rincyls?'. Gwneud pethau neis i bobl eraill yw esboniad Tad-cu. Today Hari asks Tad-cu: 'Why do people have wrinkles?'.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae dwr yr harbwr wedi troi'n wyrdd dros nos. Tybed beth yw e a sut y gwnaiff yr Harbwr Feistr cael gwared ohono? The harbour water has turned green overnight. What is causing this?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen .

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Pan mae Wini'n colli ei morthwyl gwichlyd ar yr ynys, mae'r ffrindiau'n ail-droedio'u llwybr ac yn defnyddio eu synhwyrau! Wynona loses her squeaky hammer somewhere on the island!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn a Sam yn drifftio ar y môr. Sut lwyddan nhw i ddal sardinau ar gyfer bwydlen heno? Siôn and Sam are adrift in the open sea. How will they catch sardines for today's menu?

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Norman wedi cael ofn ar ol gweld ffilm ofnus ac yn credu fod pawb yn troi mewn i sombis! Norman is scared after watching a horror film and believes everyone is turning into zombies.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae bwa ar fin dymchwel gan fygwth y creaduriaid ar y riff oddi tani, felly mae'r Octonots yn ceisio symud y trigolion. The Octonauts need to evacuate the creatures living around a reef.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri'n cael galwad i weud fod ffens wedi torri ar y fferm, a'r anifeiliaid am ddianc! Harri gets a call to say that a fence has broken on the farm, and the animals are trying to escape!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Bobo Gwyn yn dod i glywed am y tro y cyfarfu'r Cymylaubychain ag e am y tro cynta'. Bobo Gwyn learns about when he and Cymylaubychain met for the first time.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Abel wedi cysgu'n hwyr ac mae Digbi a'i ffrindiau yn teimlo'n ddi-amynedd gan bod y siop ar gau. Frustrated his friends can't buy anything from Abel's shop, Digbi opens his own store.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Cari a'i ffrindiau'n derbyn gwahoddiad i achlysur arbennig iawn. Tybed beth yw'r achlysur? Cari and her friends receive an invitation to a special event. What can it be?

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas yn mwynhau chwarae gêm o bêl-droed ar y traeth nes i'r gwynt gipio'r bêl. On the beach, the Abadas find out that a 'ball' isn't the only thing that moves in the wind.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop ar y traeth - peidiwch anghofio rhoi'r eli haul arno! The Tralalas play with lots of things on the beach - what is that thing tied to a string flying in the wind?

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Daw criw o robotiaid i helpu Blero a'i ffrindiau i godi pont arbennig, ac mae Al Tal yn profi ei bod yn ddiogel. Blero and friends are joined by a group of robots to build a bridge.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jamborî.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae bot danfon parseli'n mynd yn dw-lal, ac yn creu trafferthion mawr ar hyd a lled Dyffryn Dryswch. A parcel delivery bot goes haywire, and creates big problems all over Dyffryn Dyrswch.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dewi Sant sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dewi Sant join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig i blant yn dilyn anturiaethau Tib, Lalw a Bobl. An animated series for children following the adventures of Tib, Lalw and Bobl.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Betsi yn derbyn Llyfr Swyn byw sy'n ei gorchymyn i ddechrau Gwers 1 - 'Mae Tylwythen Deg Dda yn Helpu Eraill Bob Amser'. Betsi receives a live spell book of magic.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Mae Lewis yn holi, 'Beth yw Mellt a Tharanau' a dyma Tad-cu'n dechrau ar stori sili arall am chwilen o'r enw Cranogwen oedd yn ofn y glaw. Today, Lewis asks: what is thunder and lightning?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'n ben-blwydd ar rywun yn yr harbwr heddiw, ond pwy? Someone is celebrating a birthday today but who?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn,Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae Wini'n creu model o Felin Wynt yr Ynys Ddoeth ond mae'n siomedig nad yw'r hwyliau'n troi. Wynona makes a model of the Wise Island Windmill and is disappointed when its sails don't spin.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae'r pentrefwyr yn ceisio ail greu sidan gwallt Carlos y steilydd i Mama Polenta! Mama Polenta's friends try their very best to replicate Carlos the hairdresser's secret hair conditioner!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tân a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tân and friends in the village.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Ar ôl i'r Octofad fynd i drafferthion mae'r unig ffordd i gael y darn newydd sydd ei angen yw trwy ymweld â'r hen Octofad. On a visit to the old Octopad the Octonauts discover some visitors.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Yn y bwyty mae Alys a Jez yn brysur yn coginio, ond wedi colli'r allwedd i'r drws, beth am y cwsmeriaid? Alys and Jez cook lunch but have lost the front door keys so customers can't come in!

programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Cymry ar Gynfas
programme.desc: Y comedïwr Kiri Pritchard-Mclean, a'r artist portreadau Corrie Chiswell sy'n gweithio tuag at bortread tro hwn. Comedian Kiri Pritchard-Mclean is painted by portrait artist Corrie Chiswell. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro takes a quick look at next week's thrilling horrors before closing up for the night. [S]

programme.title: Legend Of The Witches
programme.desc: 1970. Docu-drama. Directed by Malcolm Leigh & Narrated by Guy Standeven. Originally X-rated, the famous cult film about witches and witchcraft in Britain. [S]

programme.title: Cuckoo Patrol
programme.desc: 1967. Comedy. Freddie Garrity of Freddie and the Dreamers fame is the scout cub leader of a bunch of misfits. Stars: Kenneth Connor, John Le Mesurier and Bernie Dwyer. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Back to Californy. 1963. Stars Irene Ryan, Buddy Ebsen & Nancy Kulp. The Clampetts are going back to Beverly Hills with Pearl and Jethrine, but Jethrine doesn't want to leave her boyfriend behind. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: Dark Return. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Robert Bray. Looking to escape a storm, Frankie Niles ducks into a barn and witnesses a murder. [S]

programme.title: Murder in Eden
programme.desc: 1961. Thriller. Director: Max Varnel. Stars: Ray McAnally, Catherine Feller, Yvonne Buckingham. After discovering a famous painting is a forgery, a noted art critic is killed by driver. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Bronze, Silver and Gold
programme.desc: 1969. A fascinating look at the challenge provided by the Duke Of Edinburgh's Award scheme to children in Britain.

programme.title: Port of Escape
programme.desc: 1956. Crime drama directed by Anthony Young. Two men on the run hide out in a Thames boat and take the woman owner hostage. Starring Bill Kerr, Googie Withers and Joan Hickson. [S]

programme.title: Break in the Circle
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Director: Val Guest. Stars Forrest Tucker, Eva Bartok & Marius Goring. Skip is hired by a millionaire to smuggle his friend into England, but things quickly take a turn for the worse. [S]

programme.title: Forbidden
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by George King. Stars Douglass Montgomery, Hazel Court & Patricia Burke. An ex-serviceman plans to escape his faithless wife. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Gold in the Mud
programme.desc: 1969. An interesting look at the world of scampi which has increased in popularity.

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Race. 1974. Stars Jennifer Wilson, Richard Easton, John Rolfe. The board is divided about sponsorship of David's race. Meanwhile, Martin questions Brian about Jennifer's relationship with Ted. [S]

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: 1971. Western. Directed by Ted Post. Stars Clint Walker, Kathryn Hays & Edgar Buchanan. Tough U.S. marshal Dave Harmon is sent out to Yuma, Arizona to clean up the lawless western town. [S]

programme.title: Tarnished Heroes
programme.desc: 1961. War. Directed by Ernest Morris. Stars Dermot Walsh & Patrick McAlinney. Major Bell and a ragtag team undertake a dangerous mission to destroy a bridge of strategic importance to the enemy. [S]

programme.title: The Super Secret Service
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Directed by Charles W. Green. Stars Peter Sellers, Graham Stark, Dick Emery & Raymond Francis. Brilliantly bizarre comedy short about the workings of the 'Super Secret Service'. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Pilot - UFO Sightings/Reincarnation. 1993. Michael Aspel introduces stories of the unexplained; this episode looks at UFO sightings in West Yorkshire and a woman who believes she was reincarnated. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Fairground. 1976. Stars James Ellis, David Jackson, Sheila Fay, John Duttine & David Sterne. A young girl is attacked, and Lynch has to look into 'all the fun of the fair'. [S]

programme.title: Manhunt
programme.desc: The Train May Be Late. 1970. Stars Peter Barkworth, Cyd Hayman & Patrick Kavanagh. Vincent, Nina and Adelaide attempt to escape Bordeaux and embark on a highly dangerous train journey. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret and the Rich. 2000. Stars Bruno Cremer, Michel Duchaussoy & Cécile Bois. An anonymous letter, warning that a murder will be committed, leads Maigret to a famous maritime lawyer's home. [S]

programme.title: We Were Strangers
programme.desc: 1949. Adventure. Director: John Huston. Stars John Garfield, Jennifer Jones, Gilbert Roland. A Cuban American returns home to craft a plan to lure the country's corrupt leaders into a deadly trap.

programme.title: We Were Strangers
programme.desc: 1949. Adventure. Director: John Huston. Stars John Garfield, Jennifer Jones, Gilbert Roland. A Cuban American returns home to craft a plan to lure the country's corrupt leaders into a deadly trap.

programme.title: The Leather Boys
programme.desc: 1964. Drama. Directed by Sidney J. Furie. Stars Rita Tushingham, Colin Campbell & Dudley Sutton. The swift marriage of a young couple begins to crumble after husband Reggie meets a handsome biker. [S]

programme.title: Mr Kingstreet's War
programme.desc: 1972. Thriller. During WWII, American couple Mr Kingstreet (John Saxon) and Maggie (Tippi Hedren), run a reserve that is located between British and Italian colonies in South Africa. [S]

programme.title: A View from a Hill
programme.desc: 2005. Horror. Director: Luke Watson. Stars Mark Letheren, Pip Torrens & David Burke. A historian is sent to verify an archaeological collection. Whilst there he discovers a gruesome local legend. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Mother Hubbard Case. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Sherlock Holmes tracks down a murderer who lures victims to empty houses, where they are killed. [S]

programme.title: Demobbed
programme.desc: 1944. Comedy. Demobbed from the army, four troublesome soldiers are reunited with their old Sergeant. Starring Norman Evans, Nat Jackley and Dan Young. Directed by John E Blakely. [S]

programme.title: Royal Family at War
programme.desc: 1995. Documentary. Narrated by Peter Williams. An intriguing insight into the lives of the Royal Family during WWII, with personal accounts from those who had surrounded them throughout the war. [S]

programme.title: First Comes Courage
programme.desc: 1943. War. Directed by Dorothy Arzner. Stars Merle Oberon, Brian Aherne & Carl Esmond. A member of the Norwegian resistance faces complications when a British commando falls in love with her. [S]

programme.title: The Hasty Heart
programme.desc: 1949. Richard Todd, Ronald Reagan & Patricia Neal star in this sensitive adaptation of John Patrick's play focusing on a soldier with little time left, & the friendships he makes with those around him

programme.title: A Little of What You Fancy
programme.desc: 1968. A loving tribute to British Music Hall with Lily Morris & Gus Elen. Featuring original archive film, rare prints, portraits and photographs, it traces what remains of the great music halls. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Tables of the Heart - Part 1. 1973. Stars Nick Tate, Barbara Lott & Richard Leech. Surgeon, Stephen Saul, faces charges of criminal assault and of causing the death of his patient Eric Maple. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Tables of the Heart - Part 2. 1973. Stars Richard Leech & David Ashford. Sir Austin Semple gives his opinion on Eric Maple's heart condition and Charles Lotterby makes his counter statements. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Tables of the Heart - Part 3. 1973. Stars Nick Tate, Jonathan Elsom & Frank Moorey. Stephen Saul faces a tough cross examination and Dr. Venning gives evidence in his defence. [S]

programme.title: The Long Memory
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Directed by Robert Hamer. Stars John Mills, Elizabeth Sellars, John McCallum & Geoffrey Keen. Released from prison after 12 years, a man seeks revenge on those who lied at his trial. [S]

programme.title: Aberdeen: The Silver City
programme.desc: A late 60s local authority travelogue showcasing the wonders of the great Scottish city of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Those British Faces
programme.desc: 1993. Documentary series that acts as a tribute to the greats of British cinema. This episode focuses on a brilliant tribute to Anna Neagle. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: Libel. 1961. Stars John Ireland & Philip Latham. Two investment brokers sue a newspaper for an article claiming they worked for the Nazis. Eastern Insurance must prove the story is not libellous. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Chosen Victim. 1976. Stars Patrick O'Connell, Derek Benfield & Kate O'Mara. An upward drift in Hammond stock rouses Brian's interest. Meanwhile, Jennifer and Ted receive bad news from Barbara. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: A Token Attempt. 1985. Stars Leigh Lawson, Dee Sadler & Terry Taplin. Lomax is persuaded by the journalist, Robinson, to help his godchild Billie, who has a drug problem. [S]

programme.title: The Gold Robbers
programme.desc: The Midas Touch. 1969. Stars Peter Vaughan, Richard Leech & Paul Stassino. Cradock has got his man - the brains behind the heist. But he knows all too well there's someone bigger still at large. [S]

programme.title: Playtime
programme.desc: 1967. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. With Barbara Dennek & Rita Maiden. When Monsieur Hulot has to contact a US official in Paris, he gets lost in the complexity of the modern city. [S]

programme.desc: 3/4. Bill visits Perth and experiences a heady comedic cocktail of hip wineries and prison tunnels, strange gnomes and heavy metal jamming.

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Simon gives two complete strangers, Sam and Eva, the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in Rugby, Warwickshire. Can they put their differences aside and make it a success?

programme.title: Martin Compston's Scottish Fling
programme.desc: 1/6. Martin Compston and Phil MacHugh travel up the west coast of Scotland on an adventure to discover the different ways people experience the great Scottish outdoors.

programme.title: Wartime Farm
programme.desc: The team tackle the conditions in late 1940, when British cities were heavily bombed. 3/8

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: 32/35. Charlie and Chris are in Devizes to transform a tired old plot into a desert garden, reminiscent of Arabia, for John and Vanessa

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: 24/35. Charlie and Lee are in Newport to design a garden for Angie and her treasured dog Stan that will transform her neglected space into a haven to remember lost loved ones.

programme.title: Groupie Girl
programme.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

programme.desc: Riotous early 70s comedy in which an audacious cat burglar steals more than his female victims' jewellery. Contains sexual scenes.
